Property.Name: time_now
Property.Description: Local time clock of HTS. Format is fixed point GPS time (32 bit seconds, 32 fractional seconds).

Property.Name: delta
Property.Description: Difference between last-written value and time_now (now – written value).

Property.Name: frequency
Property.Description: Frequency in Hz of timebase clk input

Property.Name: PPS_tolerance_PPM
Property.Description: Parts-per-million (PPM) value which rising edge of timebase PPS can deviate while still being considered valid

Property.Name: PPS_test
Property.Description: Insert simulation-only PPS generator for testing.

Property.Name: clr_status_sticky_bits
Property.Description: Writes of value true clear the sticky status bits

Property.Name: force_time_now_to_free_running
Property.Description: Suppress discipline of local time clock by software, PPS, or GPS (force time clock to be a free-running counter)

Property.Name: valid_requires_write_to_time_now
Property.Description: When true, timeservice master’s valid will not go high until time_now is written from software

Property.Name: enable_time_now_updates_from_PPS
Property.Description: When true, time_now fractional seconds can be disciplined by timebase PPS input

Property.Name: force_time_now_valid
Property.Description: When true, time service master's valid is always true

Property.Name: force_time_now_invalid
Property.Description: When true, time service master's valid is always false. Precedence given to force_time_now_valid if both properties are true.

Property.Name: PPS_lost_sticky_error
Property.Description: An active PPS fell outside the +/- PPS_tolerance window.

Property.Name: time_now_updated_by_PPS_sticky
Property.Description: At least one valid PPS input has disciplined time_now.

Property.Name: PPS_ok
Property.Description: PPS fell within the valid window in the last second.

Property.Name: PPS_lost_last_second_error
Property.Description: PPS went missing from the valid window in the last second

Property.Name: PPS_count
Property.Description: Count of PPS events, rolling 8 bits.

Property.Name: ticks_per_second
Property.Description: The number of timebase clk rising edges between the last 2 timebase PPS input rising edges.
